item.title: Aspect Based Sentiment Analysis
item.description: Aspect Based Sentiment Analysis Here I report on approaches to ABSA as a Bert Sentence Pair Classification (BERT-SPC) problem together with domain adaptation of the Bert language model (BERT-ADA). I also present my implementation of both BERT-SPC and BERT-ADA. What is ABSA? Example: “The dessert in this restaurant is good but the service is poor”. In this review sentence, sentiments (i.e., polarity) are expressed towards different “aspects” of the domain, namely “food” with a positive polarity, and “service” with a negative polarity.
